meta.notes: This file is the Single Source of Truth (SOT) for all Skyesoft prefixes. All prefixes must comply with the Prefix Registry Framework (PRF) rules PRF-0001 through PRF-0007. No prefixes may be added, modified, or removed except through Codex governance.

prefixes.description: Prefix Registry governance, rules, and constitutional oversight.
Canonical file and directory identifiers within the Repository Inventory.
Companies, clients, vendors, or jurisdictions recognized by the system.
Physical or virtual locations, including sites, offices, and jurisdictions.
Contact identifiers including clients, staff, vendors, and individuals.
Job orders, production tasks, and operational work instructions.
Estimate, quote, and pricing request identifiers.
Invoice identifiers used for billing, accounting, and financial tracking.
Site surveys, field measurements, and verification records.
All system-generated documents, memos, letters, zoning reports, and records.
Codex modules, components, engines, and structural logic units.
Permit identifiers for building, electric, and sign permits tracked in Skyesoft.

Optional identifiers for referencing individual audit violations detected during operational or governance audits. Violations are immutable observations, not error entities, and have no lifecycle or resolution state.
Prompt Ledger entries recording user prompts and system replies.
